events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund for the purchase. Please advise on the next steps.
The reported issue is identified as a refund request due to receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Emma has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! I’m Emma from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll assist you with your refund today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and initiate the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item clearly in this message.
Thank you for the details. We have confirmed the error and will process a full refund within 3-5 business days. You do not need to return the item.
Thanks for the prompt help. I appreciate not having to return the wrong item and the quick refund process.
The refund has been initiated and you should see the amount back in your account shortly. Please contact us if you have further concerns.
Just checking in to ensure you received the refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we will close this case now. Thank you for contacting support and have a great day!
